article_title: ObamaCare vs. Little Sisters of the Poor
article_text:
On Wednesday the Supreme Court will hear oral arguments in Little Sisters of the Poor v. Burwell, a landmark case challenging the Department of Health and Human Services contraceptive mandate under the Affordable Care Act.

In addition to the Little Sisters of the Poor, an order of Catholic nuns whose mission is to “offer the neediest...

twitter.description: Catholic University President John Garvey writes about the Supreme Court case Little Sisters of the Poor v. Burwell and says that no law or regulation, including the Affordable Care Act, should force religious adherents to pay for services that violate the tenets of their faith.
twitter.title: ObamaCare vs. Little Sisters of the Poor
